mapper.select: select count(1) as totalOrderCount, count(case when status = 2 then 1 else null end) as paidOrderCount, count(case when status != 2 then 1 else null end) as unpaidOrderCount, sum(amount) as totalOrderAmount, sum(case when status = 2 then amount else 0 end) as paidOrderAmount, sum(case when status != 2 then amount else 0 end) as unpaidOrderAmount, sum(case when status = 2 and callback_status = 2 then amount else 0 end) as callbackAmount, sum(case when status = 2 || status = 1 then order_fee else 0 end) as fee from df_pay_order ${ew.customSqlSegment}
